title: Stuff a Container at the CFS
description: Multiple small shipments of export cargo are at the CFS and need to be consolidated (stuffed) into a single container.

tasks.description: Receive a work order to stuff a 40' container with several specified shipments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The CFS planner has a list of all cargo that needs to be loaded into one container.

tasks.description: Create a load plan to ensure the cargo fits and the weight is distributed evenly.
tasks.expected_outcome: A plan is created showing how to arrange the cargo inside the container.

tasks.description: Instruct a forklift gang to load the cargo according to the plan, then seal the container and record the seal number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The container is loaded, a new seal is affixed, and the seal number is logged in the system, readying the container for export.
